experience: You and David both know Peter Reno, Jim Skidmore, and 25 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
David worked at Charles Schwab before you started

Created test plans, test cases.  Conducted test execution.  Lead in all phases of testing activities.  Managed quality assurance budget and resources for assigned projects.  Conducted business analysis.  Defined and improved process to ensure projects were delivered in time.  Coached offshore vendor in developing test plan, test cases, and performing test execution......
Reviewed business requirements.  Performed functional and regression testing of the Chinese language version of the schwab.com trading site.
recommendations: February 21, 2017, David worked with Wing in different groups

I was a QA lead as Wing's counterpart on numerous projects at Charles Schwab.  Wing is an extremely experienced tech lead. He takes great pride in his work, and always works tirelessly in finding the best solutions to produce high profile customer-facing applications.  Every time I log in to the Schwab.com trading site, I marvel at the applications that Wing had worked on over the years. These products are so intuitive to use, yet I know they involved a great amount of cross-organizational coordination and effort. Wing is the ultimate team player. He shares knowledge with a group of junior level software developers, and engages them in the best software development process. He's very approachable, and can explain technically complicated software architecture to a non-technical audience.  I feel very lucky to have worked with Wing during my tenure at Schwab.
